description: This file defines API endpoints for a notes management application using FastAPI. It includes route handlers for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and searching notes, as well as startup initialization logic.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router instance used to define API routes and event handlers.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model representing a note, used as a response model.

classes.name: NoteCreate
classes.description: Model used for creating a new note.

classes.name: NoteUpdate
classes.description: Model used for updating an existing note.

classes.name: NotesStore
classes.description: Storage class managing notes data, providing methods for CRUD operations and search.

methods.name: startup_event()
methods.description: Initializes the notes store with sample data at application startup.

methods.name: list_notes()
methods.description: Returns a list of all notes sorted by creation date descending.

methods.name: get_note(note_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: create_note(note: NoteCreate)
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided data.

methods.name: update_note(note_id: int, note: NoteUpdate)
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID.

methods.name: delete_note(note_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

methods.name: search_notes(query: str = Query(..., min_length=1, description="Search string (at least 1 character)"))
methods.description: Searches notes for a given substring in title or content.

ctags.name: search_notes
ctags.pattern: /^def search_notes(query: str = Query(..., min_length=1, description="Search string (at least 1 ch/
ctags.signature: (query: str = Query(..., min_length=1, description="Search string (at least 1 character)"))
